404.title: Page not found
404.subtext_html:
We have just relaunched our website on Shopify Plus! Bigger… better… but not yet perfect. Please bear with us while we work the bugs out, and take a look at our product range while you're here. Thanks!

Some products may no longer be available. If you are looking for something specific, please try searching below:

search.no_results_html: Your search for {{ search }} did not yield any results. Try searching for something else.

cart_summary.title: Your Order
cart_summary.empty_html: You have no items in your cart

general.no_matches: You don't have any articles yet! Once you've written one, it will show up here.

comments.name: Name

comments.error: There was an error posting your comment.

general.title: Shopping Bag Summary
general.backorder: Product is backordered and will ship as soon as it is back in stock.

label.note: Add a note to your order

multi_currency.notice_html: {{ shop_name }} process all orders in {{ shop_currency }}. While the content of your cart is currently displayed in {{ selected_currency }}, you will checkout using {{ shop_currency }} at the most current exchange rate.

general.empty: Sorry, there are no products matching your search
